answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some case studies that may be a helpful start to your search.
This case study from San Jose, CA discusses how they trimmed their budget.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/2819/Investing_in_Results_San_Jose_California_Case_Study
A similar case study details how Sarasota County, FL responded to the economic crisis.
http://icma.org/en/Article/100257/CASE_STUDY_Sarasota_County_FL_Local_Economic_Stimulus
This is a copy of Falls Church, VA‘s Proposed FY 2011 budget cuts. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302358/City_Managers_Porposed_FY_2011_Budget_Cuts_Employee_Compensation_Raises_Tax_Rate_Fully_Funds_Schools
This is a brief cases study of 2009 Minneapolis budget.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302363/2009_City_of_Minneapolis_BudgetInBrief
This case study details how Menlo Park, California downsized.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/2137/Case_Study_Downsizing_is_Rough
I also included a report you may find helpful called, “Navigating the Fiscal Crisis: Tested Strategies for Local Leaders.” The zip file includes a PowerPoint presentation and PDF report.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/9111/Navigating_the_Fiscal_Crisis_Tested_Strategies_for_Local_Leaders
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern 
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Lloyd Harrell
text:
I teach an eigth hour budgeting course for law enforcement executives.  The class consists of professionals who are new to management ranks and are mastering various skills.  The class covers the basics of city/county budgeting.
I am looking for a short budget exercise or a good budget case study which can prompt some good discussion. 
Anyone have some leads on where I can find such information?
Thanks...Lloyd Harrell
title: Budgeting Exercise or Case Study
